raiseActionButtons.title: Configuration option name for raising action buttons

rapidClickProtection.title: Configuration option name for the minimum duration between clicks on potentially damaging buttons (for example, rollback and warning buttons)

revertOption.title: Title for revert options dialog
revertOption.description: Description of the options dialog for revert options, which are shown whenever viewing a diff

revertDoneOption.title: Configuration option name for what to do after a rollback is completed

options.latest: Option to go to the latest revision's diff
options.message: Option to send the user a message
options.template: Option to send a quick template to the user
options.report: Option to report the user to a board (eg [[WP:AIV]] on enwiki)
options.mat: Option to open the Multiple Action Tool

revertMethod.title: Configuration option name for the method of reversion to use
revertMethod.description: Text describing the configuration option - include the fact that MediaWiki rollback requires the  rollback user right but is faster

options.rollback: Option to use MediaWiki rollback (for rollbackers only)

redirectIfNotLatest.title: Configuration option name for the option to redirect to the latest revision if reverting an old revision

ignoreSameUserLatest.title: Configuration option name for the option to ignore the latest revision from a user if reverting an older revision by them
ignoreSameUserLatest.description: Text describing the configuration option - mention that it will only be reverted if the latest revision was made by the same user and there are no intermediate edits by other users

noticeOrder.title: Configuration option name for the order of which warning templates are displayed

options.title: Option to sort by the title of the warning template
options.template: Option to sort by the template's name
